title: GoPro Awards: Perfect Surf Day in the Maldives
description:
While out on a friend’s boat, Micah Lester cruises through the Maldives, scoring a perfect day at Sultans with this perfect wave.

Shot 100% on the HERO4® camera

asset.title: GoPro Awards: Perfect Surf Day in the Maldives

transcripts: The conditions that day was really really perfect. Everything the wind, the direction, good size as well i don't know maybe 8 to 10 feet. In cut break the barrel is super long and I like to be in the barrel the whole time. Feeling to surf a barrel in cut break, it's amazing all the conditions was really perfect.
